text:
Dr. John G. Schwarzwalder
November 18, 1957
-2-
The Board of Directors of the NAEB is faced with some very
GRAVE DECISIONS WHICH WILL HAVE A LASTING EFFECT UPON
BOTH RADIO AND TELEVISION BROADCASTING FOR EDUCATIONAL
PORPOSES, AND, VERY RIGHTLY, THEY DID NOT FEEL THAT THEY
COULD MAKE ANY SNAP JUDGMENTS NOR SUPERFICIAL DECISIONS
UPON ANY MATTERS AS FUNDAMENTAL AND AS FAR REACHING AS
THE TWO PROPOSALS MADE BY YOU AT ALLERTON HOUSE.
This does not mean that the Board did not give a lot of
CONSIDERATION TO THESE LARGER PROBLEMS, NOR THAT IT DOES
NOT RECOGNIZE THE NECESSITY FOR MEETING THE CHANGING NEEDS
OF OUR PROFESSIONAL ORGANIZATION. It JUST FELT THAT IT
WAS NECESSARY TO TAKE A LONGER AND MORE DETAILED LOOK
AT THE WHOLE PICTURE RATHER THAN TO ATTEMPT SEGMENTED
DECISIONS,
J THINK YOU WILL ADMIT THAT YOU ARE BEING SOMEWHAT UNFAIR
IN SAYING THAT NAEB IS ”DOMINATED BY A GROUP OF MIDWESTERN
RADIO STATIONS HAVING LITTLE INTEREST IN ETV AND APPARENTLY
NO INTEREST IN THE COMMUNITY ETV STATIONS. " YOU SHOULD
KNOW THAT 6 OF THE 12 PEOPLE ON THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS
REPRESENT EDUCATIONAL TELEVISION STATIONS. ONE OTHER MEMBER,
Bob Schenkken, is the Chairman of the ETV project of the
Southern Regional Education Board and has considerably
MORE THAN A PASSING INTEREST IN THE WELFARE OF ALL ETV
STATIONS, AND MY STATION IS ESSENTIALLY A COMMUNITY STATION,
and as Chairman of the Station Activation Committee of the
SREB AND HAVING BEEN ACTIVELY INVOLVED IN THE PROMOTION
OF TWO OTHER COMMUNITY STATIONS IN OUR STATE, I FEEL
THAT I HAVE SOME RIGHT TO SPEAK FOR COMMUNITY STATIONS.
In view of these facts, I THINK it would BE HARD to maintain
YOUR POSITION THAT ETV IS NOT PROPERLY REPRESENTED ON
the Board of Directors of NAEB. I know you were chagrined
THAT THERE WAS NOT MORE IMMEDIATE AND POSITIVE ACTION ON
YOUR SUGGESTIONS AT St. LOUIS, AND I KNOW THAT YOU ARE AN
IMPATIENT MAN, AND I BELIEVE THAT THIS CAUSED YOU TO MAKE
SOME JUDGMENTS WITHOUT HAVING ALL THE FACTS AT HAND.
I HOPE YOU WILL RECONSIDER AND WITHDRAW SOME OF THE STATEMENTS
YOU MADE AND JOIN WITH ALL OF US IN THE SELFLESS
PURPOSE OF STRENGTHENING AND EXPANDING NAEB„
